name: Lab Rat (fnelix)
description:
early post-Jam version

Changes
  • fixed angle tracking camera
  • some visual issues
  • 4s cycle time
  • press 'R' to reset level
  • press 'E' in win/lose screen to continue/retry
  • additional UI elements for recipes
  • simple hands animatio
Controls:
  • Mouse: Look around
  • WASD: Move around
  • E: Pick up / drop 
  • R: Reset level
  • P: Pause
  • F10: Toggle mouse capture
  • Left mouse button: Mouse capture
